instructions:
Find the correct combination of four secret colors generated by our 'AI'.
For each correctly positioned color, you will receive a red indicator.
For each correct color in the wrong position, you will receive a white indicator.
Enter your secret combination using the available color numbers.
en.input_prompt: Please enter your four color numbers (Turn {turn}/{max_turns}):
en.input_error: Your input is incorrect. Please enter exactly four valid numbers between 1 and 6.
